title: Hotel 1 Check-in
activities: Check into your first hotel in the Le Marais neighborhood.
notes: A central and trendy neighborhood with easy access to many of the city's sights.

title: Neighborhood Walk
activities: Take a walk to get your bearings. Check out the Place des Vosges and the shops along Rue des Rosiers.
notes: Take a walk to get your bearings. Check out the Place des Vosges and the shops along Rue des Rosiers.

title: Dinner at a Creperie
activities: Enjoy a casual and traditional French crepe dinner.
notes: Enjoy a casual and traditional French crepe dinner.

title: Accommodation
activities: Overnight stay in Le Marais.
notes: Return to your accommodation in Le Marais.

title: Notre Dame Cathedral & Sainte-Chapelle
activities: Marvel at the ongoing reconstruction of Notre Dame. Then, visit the stunning stained-glass windows of Sainte-Chapelle.
notes: Marvel at the ongoing reconstruction of Notre Dame. Then, visit the stunning stained-glass windows of Sainte-Chapelle.

title: Lunch and Exploration
activities: Cross the bridge to the Left Bank. Find a bistro for lunch and wander through the charming streets of the Latin Quarter.
notes: Cross the bridge to the Left Bank. Find a bistro for lunch and wander through the charming streets of the Latin Quarter.

title: Christmas Market
activities: Visit the Christmas Market at Notre Dame/Square Viviani.
notes: Visit the Christmas Market at Notre Dame/Square Viviani. This is one of the most picturesque markets in the city.

title: Dinner and Rest
activities: Relax with a cozy dinner near your hotel after a busy day.
notes: Relax with a cozy dinner near your hotel after a busy day.

title: Accommodation
activities: Rest up after a day of sightseeing.
notes: Rest up after a day of sightseeing.

title: Hotel Transfer
activities: Check out and travel to your next hotel in the Montmartre area.
notes: Check out and travel to your next hotel in the Montmartre area.

title: Hotel 2 Check-in
activities: Settle into your hotel in the artistic Montmartre neighborhood.
notes: Settle into your hotel in the artistic Montmartre neighborhood.

title: Lunch and Exploration
activities: Find a classic bistro for lunch and wander through the charming streets of Montmartre.
notes: Find a classic bistro for lunch and wander through the charming streets of Montmartre.

title: Sacré-Cœur Basilica & Artists Square
activities: Take the funicular up to the basilica for panoramic views of the city. Explore the Place du Tertre, where artists work and sell their art.
notes: Take the funicular up to the basilica for panoramic views of the city. Explore the Place du Tertre, where artists work and sell their art.

title: Dinner and Entertainment
activities: Have dinner in the neighborhood. Consider seeing a cabaret show like the Moulin Rouge, which is a short walk away.
notes: Have dinner in the neighborhood. Consider seeing a cabaret show like the Moulin Rouge, which is a short walk away.

title: Accommodation
activities: Overnight stay in Montmartre.
notes: Overnight stay in Montmartre.

title: Musée de l'Erotisme & Shopping
activities: A quirky and fun alternative to more traditional museums. Afterward, browse the boutiques in the neighborhood.
notes: A quirky and fun alternative to more traditional museums. Afterward, browse the boutiques in the neighborhood.

title: Lunch and Window Shopping
activities: Walk down the famous avenue, admiring the festive decorations.
notes: Walk down the famous avenue, admiring the festive decorations.

title: Arc de Triomphe & Holiday Lights
activities: Climb the Arc de Triomphe for a panoramic view of the avenues. The Christmas lights will be on and are spectacular.
notes: Climb the Arc de Triomphe for a panoramic view of the avenues. The Christmas lights will be on and are spectacular.

title: Dinner and Rest
activities: Relax with a cozy dinner after a busy day.
notes: Relax with a cozy dinner after a busy day.

title: Accommodation
activities: Overnight stay in Montmartre.
notes: Overnight stay in Montmartre.

title: Hotel Transfer
activities: Check out and take a taxi or RER B train to the Palace of Versailles area.
notes: Check out and take a taxi or RER B train to the Palace of Versailles area.

title: Hotel 3 Check-in
activities: Settle into your hotel near the Palace of Versailles.
notes: Settle into your hotel near the Palace of Versailles.

title: Full Day at Versailles
activities: You are already here, so you save time. Purchase a Passport ticket online to access the Palace, Trianon Estate, and Gardens.
notes: You are already here, so you save time. Purchase a Passport ticket online to access the Palace, Trianon Estate, and Gardens. Dress warmly for the gardens.

title: Dinner in Versailles
activities: Enjoy a nice dinner in the town of Versailles, which is beautiful and often overlooked by tourists.
notes: Enjoy a nice dinner in the town of Versailles, which is beautiful and often overlooked by tourists.

title: Accommodation
activities: Overnight stay in Versailles.
notes: Overnight stay in Versailles.

title: Hotel 4 Check-in
activities: Settle into your hotel near Disneyland. Many have shuttle services directly to the park.
notes: Settle into your hotel near Disneyland. Many have shuttle services directly to the park.

title: Afternoon & Evening at Disneyland Park
activities: Pre-book your tickets online. The park is especially magical during its Enchanted Christmas season with special parades and shows.
notes: Pre-book your tickets online. The park is especially magical during its **Enchanted Christmas** season with special parades and shows.

title: Dinner at Disney Village
activities: Have a festive dinner at Disney Village.
notes: Have a festive dinner at Disney Village.

title: Accommodation
activities: Overnight stay at Disneyland Paris.
notes: Overnight stay at Disneyland Paris.

title: Morning at Disneyland Park
activities: Use the extra hours from staying at a Disney-affiliated hotel to enjoy the park with fewer crowds.
notes: Use the extra hours from staying at a Disney-affiliated hotel to enjoy the park with fewer crowds.

title: Travel to Airport
activities: Take the RER A to central Paris and transfer to the RER B for the airport.
notes: Take the RER A to central Paris and transfer to the RER B for the airport.

title: Departure
activities: Depart from Paris.
notes: Arrive at the airport 3 hours before your flight for international travel.
